Events that occurred on 22 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1914 - Tolkien writes Ferrum et Sanguis: 1914.
1920 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1941 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1951 - Author Charles de Lint is born.
2000 - Principal photography for The Lord of the Rings (film series) ends.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age is released in Japan.
2009 - War of the Fantasy Worlds is published.
2017 - The Inklings and King Arthur is published

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
